alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Orange (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Brevard, southeastern Orange and northeastern Osceola Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lone Cabbage Fish Camp, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rockledge, Cocoa, Cocoa Beach, Cape Canaveral, Lone Cabbage Fish Camp, Sharpes, Merritt Island, Canaveral Groves, Viera, Jetty Park, Space Coast Stadium, Canaveral Acres and Georgiana. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Northern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Orange
